nodes.text: Chewbacca Returns is a featurette included in the Blu-ray and DVD release of Star Wars: The Clone Wars The Complete Season Three. It covers the development of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' season three episodes "Padawan Lost" and "Wookiee Hunt".

The featurette explores the introduction of Chewbacca in the series, the involvement of Peter Mayhew, the development of the jungle and environment of Wasskah, the Trandoshans, and the skirmish on Wasskah.
